ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ack! heh.  FS rapier    = 5pp value to player. HQ bear skin = 20pp-30pp value to tailor. look to spend between 50-70pp for 1h combine weapons. North Karana
ygData.messageBody:
> my level with a FS rapier someone was kind enough to include in a trade for
> a HQ bear skin I'd looted. Look to get a combine weapon as soon as you can.
> No idea how much they cost as I can never find a vendor selling one. (grrr)

Ack!

heh. FS rapier = 5pp value to player.
HQ bear skin = 20pp-30pp value to tailor.

look to spend between 50-70pp for 1h combine weapons.

North Karana gypsy camp down the road from the wizard spires is a good
place. Just keep an eye out for Grimfeather.

However in the age of a mature server, you should be looking for
a dragoon dirk (10pp-30pp) which have better stats than any combine
weapon does.

Harmonic.
